commentText: Secretly eating bacon is one of the best secrets I have heard of!
Oh wow I did not see that coming! I will keep my eyes peeled next time I go stay at a hotel for sure.
Reading something like this makes me want to try and keep my favorite clothes sewn up to avoid having to throw them out.
Wow. That ending does make me sad but I am so glad to hear that the ocean is helping him heal from his sadness.
Ha! I swear I have this exact same fight every day when it is raining out as well!
Yikes! That makes me think of an AI takeover in the future!
